#summary Alias List description

= Alias List =

Contains a list of [AliasGroup Alias Groups] and [Alias Aliases] used by the decoder to assign an alias name to one or more identifiers produced by the decoder.

http://sdrtrunk.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/AliasList.png

== Creating an Alias List ==

Right-click on the Alias Lists folder and select *New Alias List*.

== Deleting an Alias List ==

Right-click on the Alias List and select *Delete*
